amendment.description: Amendment mandates GAO reviews to include recommendations to reduce or eliminate excessive paperwork burdens; and requires that a GAO report be submitted 2 years after the date of enactment and resubmitted every 2 years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 108-79 adds a provision in Part A (GAO Review) mandating that the review will include recommendations to reduce or eliminate the excessive paperwork burdens for teachers, related service providers, parents and school administrators; amends Part B (GAO REport) to require a GAO report be submitted 2 years after the date of enactment and submitted every 2 years thereafter.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vitter amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 413 - 0 (Roll no. 150).
